mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into anole_user (Username, Password, CreateTime, UpdateTime, Status) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update anole_user set Username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Id, Username, Password, CreateTime, UpdateTime, Status from anole_user
